snippet.title: Paper Pirates Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab a crew and jump aboard a haunted pirate ship for a social deduction party game, using your phones as controllers! Are you a human sailing home to shore or a ghost working against the crew? Throw your crewmates overboard, but fear not - nobody’s ever out of the game!

Check out Paper Pirates, out now on Steam: https://bit.ly/2YDk80t
Join us on Twitch and take part in our next Let's Play at: https://bit.ly/3dEVEYM
Need a primer on how to play? Check out the How to Play Paper Pirates video: https://bit.ly/3eBq7IE
Learn about more events in the Paper Pirates Event Guide playlist: https://bit.ly/384oroF
Follow Iteration Games on Twitter for the latest updates on Paper Pirates: https://bit.ly/2NxeQ09
